name: Box Breathing Session
description: 5-minute guided breathing for calm, focus, and stress relief. Used by Navy SEALs and executives alike.

coach.intro: Find a comfortable position â€” sitting or lying down. Close your eyes if that feels okay. We're going to breathe in a simple box pattern: 4 counts in, 4 counts hold, 4 counts out, 4 counts hold.
coach.motivation: Your breath is the one thing you can always control. Let's use it.
coach.completion: Notice how you feel now compared to 5 minutes ago. That's your nervous system shifting. You can access this anytime you need it.

structure.text: Get comfortable. Sit or lie down. Let your shoulders drop.
Close your eyes if comfortable. Take one natural breath.
Return to natural breathing. Notice how your body feels.
When you're ready, gently open your eyes.
